title: Mini Games Sound Effects and Music Pack
description: Breathe new life into your creativity with character and vitality! Whether you're crafting heart-pounding horror, groovy retro adventure, or a brain-bending puzzle, this library has you covered.
longDescription:
Breathe new life into your creativity with character and vitality! Whether you're crafting heart-pounding horror, groovy retro adventure, or a brain-bending puzzle, this library has you covered. Find the perfect soundtrack with themes ranging from chilling terror to upbeat action, and accentuate your gameplay with a huge selection of SFX, like satisfying clicks, roaring engines, object interactions and crowd cheers. From cute browser games to epic low-poly masterpieces, Mini Games Music & SFX is a one-stop resource for sound design that truly takes your game to the next level.

 

This pack of royalty-free content includes; 

⦿ 8 x Loopable Music Track

⦿ 14 x Stingers 

⦿ 420+ Sound Effects

 

Mini Games Sound Effects and Music Pack is mostly used in Browser, Cute, Mobile, Low Poly, Puzzle, Platformer and Party games.

 

This sound and music pack includes; 

⦿ Music tracks

⦿ Stingers

⦿ UI Sounds

⦿ Applause

⦿ Firework

⦿ Fight

⦿ Combat

⦿ Card and Board

⦿ Engine

⦿ Footstep

⦿ Helicopter

⦿ Object Interactions

⦿ Sports

⦿ Voice

⦿ Write-Draw
